name: Resource
desc: A resourceâ€”such as an album, song, or playlist.

items.name: href
items.desc: A URL subpath that fetches the resource as the primary object. This member is only present in responses.

items.name: attributes
items.desc: Attributes belonging to the resource (can be a subset of the attributes). The members are the names of the attributes defined in the object model.

items.name: relationships
items.desc: Relationships belonging to the resource (can be a subset of the relationships). The members are the names of the relationships defined in the object model. See Relationship object for the values of the members.

items.name: meta
items.desc: Information about the request or response. The members may be any of the endpoint parameters.

items.name: views
items.desc: The relationship views for the resource.
